multi-species-sex2.png.description: A multi bar chart, showing the distribution of sexes across dogs (6 female, 9 male), cats (6 female, 5 male), and rabbits (1 female, 1 male)
multi-species-sex2.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using contrived data

stacked-species-sex2.png.description: A stacked bar chart, showing the distribution of sexes across dogs (6 female, 9 male), cats (6 female, 5 male), and rabbits (1 female, 1 male)
stacked-species-sex2.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using contrived data

politics-multi.png.description: A multi bar chart showing the frequency of countries with each political structure by region of the Americas. From Central America: 2 authoritarian, 4 flawed democracy, 1 full democracy, and 4 hybrid regime. From North America: 2 flawed democracy and 1 full democracy. From South America: 1 authoritarian, 7 flawed democracy, and 1 each of full democracy and hybrid regime.
politics-multi.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on The Economist Intelligence Unit's 2018 Democracy Index https://img.scoop.co.nz/media/pdfs/1901/The_EIU__Democracy_Index_2018__Press_Release__Asia.pdf

politics-stacked.png.description: A stacked bar chart showing the political structure of countries in each region of the Americas by percentage. From Central America: 18.2% authoritarian, 36.4% flawed democracy, 9% full democracy, and 36.4% hybrid regime. From North America: 67% flawed democracy and 33% full democracy. From South America: 10% authoritarian, 70% flawed democracy, and 10% each of full democracy and hybrid regime.
politics-stacked.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using data from https://gapm.io

multi-1.png.description: A stacked bar chart, with three bars of two sections each. Bar 1 has a frequency of 6 for section A and 9 for B. Bar 2 has 1 A and 1 B. Bar 3 has 6 A and 5 B.
multi-1.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using contrived data

multi-2.png.description: A stacked bar chart, with three bars of up to four sections each. Bar 1 has a frequency of 2 for section A, 4 for B, 1 for C, and 4 for D. Bar 2 has 2 B and 1 C. Bar 3 has 1 A, 7 B, 1 C and 1 D.
multi-2.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using contrived data

multi-3.png.description: A stacked bar chart, with two bars of up to three sections each. Bar 1 has a frequency of 7 for section A, 8 for B, and 1 for C. Bar 2 has 4 A, 6 B, and 1 C.
multi-3.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using contrived data

multi-4.png.description: A stacked bar chart, with two bars of up to two sections each. Bar 1 has a frequency of 11 for section A and 7 for B. Bar 2 has 2 A and 9 B.
multi-4.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using contrived data

stacked-1.png.description: A stacked bar chart, with three bars of two sections each. Bar 1 has a frequency of 6 for section A and 9 for B. Bar 2 has 1 A and 1 B. Bar 3 has 6 A and 5 B.
stacked-1.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using contrived data

stacked-2.png.description: A stacked bar chart, with three bars of up to four sections each. Bar 1 has a frequency of 2 for section A, 4 for B, 1 for C, and 4 for D. Bar 2 has 2 B and 1 C. Bar 3 has 1 A, 7 B, 1 C and 1 D.
stacked-2.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using contrived data

stacked-3.png.description: A stacked bar chart, with two bars of up to three sections each. Bar 1 has a frequency of 7 for section A, 8 for B, and 1 for C. Bar 2 has 4 A, 6 B, and 1 C.
stacked-3.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using contrived data

stacked-4.png.description: A stacked bar chart, with two bars of up to two sections each. Bar 1 has a frequency of 11 for section A and 7 for B. Bar 2 has 2 A and 9 B.
